title: Kis, Bandpey-ye Sharqi
data: Kis (Persian: كيس, also Romanized as Kīs) is a village in Sajjadrud Rural District, Bandpey-ye Sharqi District, Babol County, Mazandaran Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was 37, in 8 families.[1] This Babol County location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
